title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a big nose in a dream

preview.html: Nose in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Interpretation of seeing: An insect coming out of the nose in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with a new baby and it is a sign of kindness. But seeing an insect entering one’s nose in a dream is one of the unwanted dreams and indicates harm and sadness. Also, seeing cold in a dream indicates that The dreamer will enter a period full of difficulties and complicated things. Also, seeing a severed nose in a dream portends unpleasant things and portends death or a great affliction. Seeing a bad smell coming from the nose in a dream indicates the anxiety, sadness, and grief that the dreamer feels. A large nose in a single woman’s dream indicates an interpretation Seeing a big nose in a dream for a single woman indicates the wonderful status she will gain. A girl who sees her nose getting bigger and longer indicates some false statements coming out of her. Also, seeing a broken nose in a girl’s dream is undesirable and indicates betrayal and exposure to harm. A big nose for a woman In a dream, some interpretive scholars have suggested that a big nose in a dream indicates the oppression and injustice that the dreamer suffered from. Also, seeing someone whose nose is made of gold, silver, or iron indicates the crime he is committing. Also, seeing a woman’s big nose in a dream indicates the transmission of words and a wedge. Between people and each other. Seeing a large nose in a dream indicates an arrogant personality and is an indication of foolishness and bad speech. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a nose: Seeing someone cutting off his nose in a dream is a sign of estrangement and family problems that the dreamer will face. Also, seeing a cutting nose in a dream is a dream. She did not like it, but it only symbolizes evil, anger, and anxiety. Dry nose dirt in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dirt coming out of the nose in a dream, as this indicates problems and disasters that he will be exposed to. Seeing blood from the nose on the dreamer’s clothes in his dream means that he is eating forbidden foods. Among the dreams he interpreted Scientists consider it a sign of the dreamer's death to see a nose pierced or cut off. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing twins by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing twin boys in a dream A woman is evidence of positive things that will happen in her life. A dream of twins in a married woman’s dream may indicate marital disputes that she is exposed to. Seeing sick twins in a dream is a sign of anxiety, problems, and bad luck. Seeing a dream about Triplet twins are an indication of the problems facing the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about twins for single people. A girl who dreams of twins, this indicates that she is on the wrong path. If a single girl sees in a dream that she is avoiding twin boys, this indicates that there is a connection, but it will be a failure. Twins in general In an unmarried girl’s dream, it is evidence of failure. Interpretation of seeing twin twins for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with twins is a sign of suffering and extreme sadness. Twins in a married woman’s dream is evidence that the husband is facing a financial crisis. Interpretation of seeing a dream with twin girls and boys is evidence of happiness. And extreme joy. Interpretation of a dream about twins for a pregnant woman. Twins in a dream about pregnant women is evidence of some problems and troubles in childbirth. Seeing the birth of twins indicates the birth of a male child, but you will suffer from some problems. If a pregnant woman hears twins screaming in a dream, this indicates sadness and troubles that will befall her. Vision Twins for a manIf a man dreams that his wife has given birth to twins, this indicates a new job that he will find. If his wife has given birth to the dream, this indicates wealth and many good things rule them. The dream of a fight between twins is an indication of the financial difficulties and crises that the dreamer is going through. The unmarried young man who sees the three boys In a dream, it is a sign of success and excellence at work. Seeing the birth of twins in a dream indicates the end of problems and fears. If a man sees in a dream that a woman is giving birth to twins and screaming a lot and loudly, this indicates problems and sorrows that will happen to the dreamer. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference Refer to the social status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Ibn Sirin interpreted to see the spacious house in a dream

preview.html: A spacious house in a dream, one of the things that brings joy and happiness to the human heart is moving or buying a large and spacious house, and when you see this in a dream, it contains signs and evidence through which we know what the interpretation will be, whether it is good. It is good or bad news for the dreamer. We give him advice and make him seek refuge from this vision. Therefore, in this article, we will present the largest number of issues related to this symbol, as well as interpretations and explanations that concern major scholars and interpreters such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. The spacious house in a dream Seeing a spacious house in a dream carries many connotations and signs that can be recognized through the following cases: In a dream, it indicates a happy life and an end to the problems and disputes that stifled the dreamer’s life in the previous period. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is entering a house with a large area, this symbolizes that he will obtain good job opportunities from which he will earn a lot of money and achieve great success. Seeing a house with a large area indicates A large house in a dream indicates developments that will occur in the dreamer’s life and will change it for the better. The spacious house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the most prominent scholars who dealt with the interpretation of seeing the spacious house in a dream is the scholar Ibn Sirin, and the following are some of the interpretations contained in it: The spacious house in Ibn Sirin’s dream is a vision that indicates... To a lot of sustenance and abundant money that the dreamer will receive in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is entering a spacious house, this symbolizes that his situation will change for the better and move to a high social level that he did not expect to live. Seeing a spacious house in a dream indicates the collapse of worries And sorrows and the arrival of joys and happy events to the dreamer. The spacious house in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a spacious house in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s marital status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl entering a spacious house in a dream indicates happiness and joy that Her life and the psychological and material stability she enjoys. If a girl sees a spacious house in a dream, this symbolizes her meeting the knight of her dreams, marrying him and living a luxurious and luxurious life. Seeing a spacious house in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will achieve success and distinction for girls of the same age, On the scientific and practical level. Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for singles. A large, spacious house in a dream for a single girl indicates that she will achieve her goals with ease and ease. If an unmarried girl sees a large and spacious house in her dream, this symbolizes the purity of her bed and good morals that make her popular among people and in a position And a high status. Seeing a large, spacious house in a dream for single people means the end of disputes and conflicts between them and those close to them and the return of the relationship again better than before. The spacious house in a married woman’s dream. A married woman who dreams of being inside a spacious house is a sign of the ample and abundant sustenance that she will obtain.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream. Known as peach fruit or peaches. It is a type of beautiful fruit grown mainly in the Levant, Palestine and Sinai. Also, seeing whole peaches in a dream is one of the visions that some people see in a dream. Therefore, we have presented to you, our esteemed followers, everything about knowing the interpretation of seeing peaches in a complete dream for a general woman and testimony for seeing a married woman eating peaches in a complete dream, as well as the interpretation of a dream of picking peaches in a complete dream for a pregnant woman according to the most important books of scholars who interpret dreams and visions.. What is the dream of peaches? Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing peaches in a dream that are completely out of season is a sign of fatigue and adversity. Eating sour peaches in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate the dreamer’s feeling of fear and anxiety in his life. Also, seeing peaches in a dream is a sign It signifies good luck and great support for the dreamer, as well as a sign of courage. Eating peaches in a dream for an entire season of the year means that the dreamer will enter a new life full of benefits and pleasures. A dream about eating peaches for someone in trouble speaks of the end of disasters and problems and a great improvement in his situation. It is considered a vision Whole peaches picked in a dream are one of the desired visions because they indicate a lot of sustenance, abundance of money, and the fulfillment of desires. The interpretation of a dream about picking peaches and then putting them in a large bowl indicates that the dreamer will accumulate great wealth within a few days. Why do peaches dream of a single woman? Scientists and translators have indicated that Seeing a whole peach in a dream for a single girl is one of the visions that lead her to goodness and the appearance of desired things in her life. Seeing a whole peach in a dream for an ordinary woman is good news and a sign that she will fulfill a great desire that she has always wanted to achieve. Seeing a whole peach in a dream for an unmarried woman It is evidence that she will have a good husband and will be happy with him. However, seeing whole peaches in a dream and not being able to get or buy them is a sign that she will not be able to fulfill her desire. If you dream that you are drinking peach juice for poor women – to recovery From diseases and freeing yourself from worries and problems. Dreaming of peaches for a married woman. In a complete dream, buying peaches from the market for a married woman means that she will receive many things that she has been deprived of. In addition, watching peach juice being made and drunk with her husband shows the end of all her disagreements and problems. With him and a noticeable improvement in her condition. The interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream eating rotten peaches is one of the unwanted visions that indicate the corruption of religion and morals and an indication of her divorce. To dream of picking peaches from a tree is one of the good dreams that indicates that she will become pregnant. Seeing a whole peach tree In a dream for a married woman, it means that her situation will be good and that she and her family will earn a lot of money and money. A pregnant woman picking peaches in a dream. A dream about peaches for a pregnant woman - good news, recovery from illness and a significant improvement in her health. Seeing a dream of picking peaches

title: Interpretation of seeing autumn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing autumn in a dream. Autumn is a season of the year that comes after winter and is characterized by warmth, a slightly higher temperature, and leaves falling. In delaying marriage, I will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing the autumn period in this article in the dream of a man, an unmarried young man, an unmarried woman, as well as a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman and a widow, providing the interpretation of seeing the autumn season to some imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and other modern-day interpreters. Follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing the autumn season in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing eating leaves in a dream for a man indicates an abundance of food and an abundance of goodness. Seeing tree leaves in the fall indicates repentance for sins. Seeing fig leaves in a man’s dream announces sad news. Seeing withered leaves in a dream Married woman: It indicates lost and false dreams, sadness and depression. Seeing dry leaves indicates financial crises and a poor financial situation. What is the interpretation of a dream about autumn for a single woman? Seeing the autumn season in a dream for a single woman indicates that he has obtained property such as an inheritance or a valuable gift, or that he has obtained On a sum of money. If a girl sees her wedding in the fall, it indicates achieving happiness with her future husband and the continuation of their happiness throughout their lives. If an unmarried woman sees withered yellow leaves, it indicates that her marriage or engagement will be delayed for a period of time that can be extended to some extent. If The girl saw green leaves, and this indicates that she received a lot of money as an inheritance from her father, mother, or relative, or her marriage to a rich man. If the girl sees that the leaves are dry or dried out, it shows her love for work and endurance in many trials and tribulations. Seeing falling leaves indicates Abandoning some decisions or beliefs and abandoning certain principles. What is the interpretation of a dream about autumn leaves? Seeing withered yellow leaves indicates difficulty in obtaining money and the dream may indicate feelings of sadness and sorrow. Seeing green tree leaves indicates a lot of goodness and an abundance of blessings and prosperity. Sweeping vision Dry leaves: It indicates putting in a lot of effort and fatigue and correcting the mistakes that the person has made. Seeing him eating tree leaves indicates the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. Seeing flying tree leaves or yellow leaves indicates lost dreams that the dreamer could not realize. What is the interpretation of the seasons in a dream? Seeing Autumn in a dream shows that she hears news that makes her happy and fulfills a wish in her life. It indicates change and development in a person’s life and his independence. Seeing winter in a dream indicates a lack of trouble, an increase in profit, and the repayment of debts. This is if the vision is at the same time and the vision at another time is not good and indicates Unlike the above to evil, evil and debts. Seeing summer indicates good news. Seeing spring indicates progress towards the goal and the fulfillment of desired hopes. Seeing the seasons can indicate feelings of sadness, defeat, and the need for challenge and resistance to overcome the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream from the Moments website. His peers in age, if he sees that all his teeth have fallen out and he takes them in his sleeve or in a room, then he will live a long time until his teeth fall out and the number of his family members will increase. He saw one of his teeth that he lost, then he was banished from one of his tribes. If he is injured after losing it, he will return, otherwise he will not be, and teeth indicate family and relatives, and perhaps indicate wealth or secrets. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream Scientists and dream interpreters unanimously agree that teeth falling out in a dream indicates a debt or a long tooth. Whoever sees In a dream, the teeth of his upper jaw fell into his hand, this indicates that the dreamer will get money. But if he sees in a dream that the teeth of his upper jaw fell into his lap and his wife is pregnant, then this is good news that the dreamer will be blessed with remembrance. By clarifying the dream of seeing all the teeth falling out This indicates that the dreamer will live a long time compared to his generation. But if he sees in his dream that all his teeth are falling out and he has a debt, then this indicates the repayment of that debt. As for the one who dreams of his tooth falling out, this indicates that he will be forgiven of all his debts at once, God willing. Dreaming of a year falling, this indicates the presence of a new baby in which the dreamer will be blessed with a brother, sister, or son. As for whoever sees a single tooth on his hand, this indicates that the visionary will give him a son if his wife is pregnant. But if the woman is not pregnant, then the loss of a year indicates that the year has fallen. However, she will get rid of the estrangement between him and a brother or relative and reconcile with him. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams of seeing the lower teeth falling out in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that God will give her a good man to marry her in the coming days. Seeing one of the upper teeth falling out It is evidence of the failure of the romantic bond or separation between you and the person you love. The awareness of a tooth falling out of the bottom row in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she will leave her engaged, but she will not regret this decision, but he will regret it and become miserable without her. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out In a married woman’s dream: Seeing teeth falling out in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her intense and constant fear of her children. Interpretation of dreams: Watching a married woman’s teeth falling out in a dream is that she has not yet given birth, proof that God will carry her in the coming days. Seeing teeth falling out in a married woman’s dream may indicate bankruptcy. Interruption of life and loss of money, but this is a temporary condition. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman’s teeth falling out in a dream is evidence that she is afraid and permanently afraid of miscarriage. The awareness that teeth are falling out in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of some marital problems that will arise Between a pregnant woman and her partner. Visualizing a pregnant woman’s children’s teeth falling out in a dream is evidence that they have some problems in their studies and evidence of their need for more care and attention. Seeing a minor appearing in a pregnant woman’s dream could be evidence
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream from the Moments website. His peers in age, if he sees that all his teeth have fallen out and he takes them in his sleeve or in a room, then he will live a long time until his teeth fall out and the number of his family members will increase. He saw one of his teeth that he lost, then he was banished from one of his tribes. If he is injured after losing it, he will return, otherwise he will not be, and teeth indicate family and relatives, and perhaps indicate wealth or secrets. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream Scientists and dream interpreters unanimously agree that teeth falling out in a dream indicates a debt or a long tooth. Whoever sees In a dream, the teeth of his upper jaw fell into his hand, this indicates that the dreamer will get money. But if he sees in a dream that the teeth of his upper jaw fell into his lap and his wife is pregnant, then this is good news that the dreamer will be blessed with remembrance. By clarifying the dream of seeing all the teeth falling out This indicates that the dreamer will live a long time compared to his generation. But if he sees in his dream that all his teeth are falling out and he has a debt, then this indicates the repayment of that debt. As for the one who dreams of his tooth falling out, this indicates that he will be forgiven of all his debts at once, God willing. Dreaming of a year falling, this indicates the presence of a new baby in which the dreamer will be blessed with a brother, sister, or son. As for whoever sees a single tooth on his hand, this indicates that the visionary will give him a son if his wife is pregnant. But if the woman is not pregnant, then the loss of a year indicates that the year has fallen. However, she will get rid of the estrangement between him and a brother or relative and reconcile with him. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams of seeing the lower teeth falling out in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that God will give her a good man to marry her in the coming days. Seeing one of the upper teeth falling out It is evidence of the failure of the romantic bond or separation between you and the person you love. The awareness of a tooth falling out of the bottom row in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she will leave her engaged, but she will not regret this decision, but he will regret it and become miserable without her. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out In a married woman’s dream: Seeing teeth falling out in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her intense and constant fear of her children. Interpretation of dreams: Watching a married woman’s teeth falling out in a dream is that she has not yet given birth, proof that God will carry her in the coming days. Seeing teeth falling out in a married woman’s dream may indicate bankruptcy. Interruption of life and loss of money, but this is a temporary condition. Interpretation of seeing teeth falling out in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman’s teeth falling out in a dream is evidence that she is afraid and permanently afraid of miscarriage. The awareness that teeth are falling out in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of some marital problems that will arise Between a pregnant woman and her partner. Visualizing a pregnant woman’s children’s teeth falling out in a dream is evidence that they have some problems in their studies and evidence of their need for more care and attention. Seeing a minor appearing in a pregnant woman’s dream could be evidence

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a box in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a box in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, from the explanations shown from all sides. The vision of a box also differs if the person who sees it is male or female, and it differs if the female is single, married, pregnant, or divorced. The interpretation of this vision was discussed with Ibn Shaheen and many dream interpretation scholars. Read also: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the box in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the box in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing breasts in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is one of the satisfactory and sufficient interpretations that explain the interpretation of the dream. accurately. A woman saw a box of gold, then this indicates that she heard good news, but if a man sees that he received a box of wood, this indicates that he will obtain money, but after a lot of fatigue and effort. Read also: Pumpkin in a dreamSeeing the box in a man’s dream says Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about breasts for a man..If ​​a person sees a wooden box open in front of him in his dream, this means that he is spending money in the wrong place. If this box is empty, it means excessive fatigue but without getting money. But if a man sees that one of his friends gives him a box containing a pet, this indicates how much his friend loves him, and this vision also shows a lot of good things. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Seeing the box in a married woman’s dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing breasts in a married woman’s dream indicates pregnancy, childbirth, and abundant nutrition, if they are made of gold or silver. Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing the box in a dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing the box in a person’s dream Unmarried indicates marriage to a rich and high-ranking man, if this box is made of gold or contains a lot of jewelry and gold. From the accumulation of debts and worries on him. But if she sees someone giving her a box with a ring, it means that she will get engaged soon and this dream bodes well. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Other interpretations of seeing breasts in a dream If you see the wooden box in a dream, this indicates success and the ability to achieve And achieving everything that is far from you and bringing food and happiness. If you see a tin box in a dream, this indicates the responsibility of siblings and parents. In the dream, it shows the connection to the womb or the house in general. Interpretation of seeing a plastic box in a dream. If you see the plastic box in a dream, this means that you will emerge from a state of excessive fatigue. It appears The abundant money that you obtain indicates some problems and fears that this person suffers from. If you see the empty box in a dream, this indicates the loss of your dream, failure to achieve your goals, loss of the job opportunity that you dreamed of, your failure to succeed in a high position, and your failure to obtain the expected . Promotion, the presence of major problems and instability in your life. The general meaning of seeing a cash register in a dream. The trunk in a dream indicates a house or a shop, according to what Ibn Sirin narrated on the authority of Al-Qayrawani. This is all that Ibn Sirin says about a vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of a dream about a wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. A dream about a wall has many connotations and interpretations that many people want to know. Moreover, the interpretation differs in the case of a demolished wall as well as an existing one. Ibn Sirin indicated that a wall in an unmarried woman’s dream is different from seeing Pregnant woman and also seeing the bride. It is completely different and this also applies to the unmarried man and the married man, because each of them has a special interpretation when he sees the wall in a dream. Interpretation of a dream on the wall by Ibn Sirin If he sees it hanging on the wall, this indicates that this person is religious and strong. Anyone who sees a wall falling in a dream will gain A lot of money, and perhaps treasure. Whoever sees himself sitting on a wall with a gold bracelet in his hand, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain money. Seeing a wall made of milk is a sign of good deeds. Seeing a wall falling inside the house is a sign of diseases and epidemics. If one sees If a wall rises, it indicates death. A man’s psychological banner on the wall is evidence of his imminent death. A wall falling inside the house is evidence of his family’s illness. Cleaning the wall in a dream means getting closer to the manager at work and obtaining a better position than the dreamer at that time. Interpretation of a dream on The Wall in Nabulsi: Demolishing a wall in a dream is a sign of failure, because it is an annoying sight. A wall in a dream is evidence of the presence of a responsible man. Seeing a bombed and demolished wall is evidence of abandoning work. Seeing a wall falling on the dreamer’s head is evidence of his resurrection from certain sins. Breaking a wall in The dream indicates stress and sadness. Falling from the wall indicates not achieving the desired goals. Building a wall in a dream can be a sign of moving to a new home. Interpretation of a dream on the wall for a single woman. Climbing the vision of the wall. For single women, it indicates success and good news. Building a wall in The dream indicates one’s marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a wall for a married woman. If a married woman sees a wall being built, this is good news for pregnancy. Climbing the wall in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the stability of marital life. If a married woman sees that her husband is building a wall in a dream, this is good news That a child will be born. Interpretation of a dream on a wall for a man: Seeing building a wall in a single man’s dream is good news for marriage. If a man sees that he is building a wall between himself and his neighbor, this is evidence of mixing between these two families. Climbing the wall A dream for a man is evidence that he knows who will support God. The fall of the wall in A dream for a man indicates failure and defeat. If a man falls from the wall and breaks his arm, he will lose a loved one. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and clarify it.

If a married woman sees a brother engaged to her, this may be a sign of good news, and God knows all that is not seen. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a brother engaged to her, this may lead to good things, God willing. Interpretation of dreams for my brother who strangled me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my brother Who strangled me in a dream. If a married woman sees in a dream someone choking me, this may indicate that there is someone conspiring against her, and God knows all that he did not see. One. If the dreamer sees someone choking him, this may indicate the psychological state of the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my brother smoking cigarettes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother smoking cigarettes in a dream could express disagreements that will not last, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a young man sees a brother smoking cigarettes, he may seek refuge in his need for his brother. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself smoking cigarettes with people, then he can express bad friends, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees smoking in a dream, this may indicate revealing secrets and that God has all the knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my brother drinking drugs in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother taking drugs in a dream and seeing Drugs represent bad friends, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself drinking drugs in a dream, this may be evidence of failure and irresponsibility, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If the dreamer sees himself taking drugs, this may lead to his inability to achieve goals and desires, and God knows best. If a woman sees The pregnant woman herself is drinking drugs in a dream, this may represent an easy birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: My brother died and I was crying in a dream. If the dreamer sees the death of a brother and cries over him in a dream, this may represent a victory over your enemy, and God knows best. If a married woman sees in a dream a brother suffering from epilepsy, this may indicate his need to get closer to his brother and help him change for the better.
